title: New: FELL – You Are All I Need (Demo)
body:
EDIT: Not his first track, FELL is Nicolas Burrows, head to his [Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.

com/fellsongs) for more. Can’t really tell you much about London’s **FELL**, aside from an ambiguous picture, and his debut demo, _You Are All I Need_, there’s not a huge amount of information. Lack of clues aside, his first offering is a gorgeously composed number, a testament to true love, showcasing both an enviable grasp on melody and touching lyricism. Part Tobias Jesso Jr. part Nick Drake, it’s a stunning first step. You Are All I Need (Demo) by FELL
